headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  POPPER, KATHRYN TROSPER

snippet: POPPER--Kathryn Trosper, passed away March 6, eleven days shy of her 101st birthday. She devoted her life to progressive causes with her husband of 43 years, Martin Popper, a famed attorney, who predeceased her. In 1945, Martin Popper co-founded the law firm, Wolf Popper LLP. The partners of Wolf Popper remember Kathryn Popper with fondness and admiration. 1/3
lead_paragraph: POPPER--Kathryn Trosper, passed away March 6, eleven days shy of her 101st birthday. She devoted her life to progressive causes with her husband of 43 years, Martin Popper, a famed attorney, who predeceased her. In 1945, Martin Popper co-founded the law firm, Wolf Popper LLP. The partners of Wolf Popper remember Kathryn Popper with fondness and admiration. 1/3
